name: Elridge Gammad
text: Meritocracy is a platonic ideal that rarely apply in real-world systems and situations. I personally am not very enthused with the appointments but I'm willing to see how it goes and they all have to pass the confirmation process. I predict that we will have a very lively opposition (reminiscent of the Erap regime) and I fully support that as part of any normal democratic process.
